titles.title: Landowner Protection Act of 2011

A bill to amend the Federal Power Act prohibit the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from requiring the removal or modification of existing structures or encroachments in licenses of the Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/20/2011--Introduced. Landowner Protection Act of 2011 - Amends the Federal Power Act to prohibit the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) from requiring removal or modification of any existing nonconforming structure or encroachment within the project boundary, except one built in bad faith, whenever it issues, denies, approves, or modifies a mandatory shoreline management plan required under a FERC license.
